scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build --emptyOutDir && node -e "require('fs').existsSync('vite.dev') && require('fs').unlinkSync('vite.dev')"
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite build --minify false --watch --emptyOutDir && node -e "require('fs').existsSync('vite.dev') && require('fs').unlinkSync('vite.dev')"
